Unit Mgr. [redacted] began the process last week, but did not have a chance to finish it. If you could arrange for someone to help Mr. Epstein set up the account, we'd really appreciate it. Thank you for all your help. [redacted] Page 15524 DOJ-OGR-00024009

text_blocks.content: From [redacted] To [redacted] Date 2019/08/05 08:48 Subject: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822

Mr. [redacted] I understand that Mr. Epstein has not yet had the opportunity to establish a telephone account. Unit Mgr. [redacted] began the process last week, but did not have a chance to finish it. If you could arrange for someone to help Mr. Epstein set up the account, we'd really appreciate it. Thank you for all your help. [redacted]

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
